auditorium

Class AAuditoriumLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.AAuditoriumLayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAuditoriumLayer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuditoriumIntegrityLayer, AuditoriumTemporalLayer

    public abstract class AAuditoriumLayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAuditoriumLayer
    This base class is extended by all auditorium layers.

    • Method Detail

      • getChild

        protected IAuditoriumLayer getChild()
        Get the layer instance which is a child of this layer.
        Returns:
        This method returns the child layer instance.

      • getHost

        protected IAuditoriumHost getHost()
        Get the adapter to the host which owns this layer instance. You can use this adapter to get at the message wrapper or to access another layer's public methods.
        Returns:
        This method returns the adapter to the host that owns this layer.
